contents:
You know what? When I see the picture of that 羊 man in front of the tank from the Episode 434 of Pleasant goat and big big wolf. That to me means there are still people who remeber this massacre and do whatever it takes to remind others of it. That’s wonderful. That hits, hits me in my heart about their intelligence。A part of me admire their courage
 
另，我记得品2恢复了贴图功能，可以找一下。
